lines.text: Why are you always wrapping yourself up in numbers like this?
So you can come and tell me what a crock it is?
Jesus was never meant to die. He failed.
Man, I ain't seen anybody regurgitate like that since the bicentennial celebrations.
My God, it must be something they put in the food.

No, man, it's what they *don't* put in it, protein. That, and all that chantin' and jumpin' and spacin' out. After awhile, your wiring blows. Women stop gettin' their periods. Guys get cheeks as smooth as the inside o' Sarah Elizabeth Murphy's left thigh.
Listen to me OK, please? I love you David, and I love Sarah, but *individually*. David, together, I think you're a mess.
[after several days of sleep deprivation, intense activity, and brainwashing]
I can't take it anymore! I got- ah- I gotta get outta here- I can't-
I *told* you it would be an incredible experience!
[the deprogrammer knocks at the door. Eric checks him out through the side window]
Well if it's a cop... -they're coming in anyway, right?
If it's one of them loonies, he *aint*!
